name: Decidueye
bio: It fires arrow quills from its wings with such precision, they can pierce a pebble at distances over a hundred yards.

name: Mimikyu
bio: Its actual appearance is unknown. A scholar who saw what was under its rag was overwhelmed by terror and died from the shock.

name: Vaporeon
bio: Blending in with the water and erasing all signs of its presence, it patiently waits for its prey, fish Pokémon.

name: Palossand
bio: Buried beneath the castle are masses of dried-up bones from those whose vitality it has drained.

name: Arcanine
bio: The fire burning inside its body serves as the energy to fuel it as it runs great distances. It appears in many legends.

name: Alolan Ninetales
bio: Legend has it that this mystical Pokémon was formed when nine saints coalesced into one.
